name: Hierophant Lich
description: The Hierophant Lich is a skeletal figure draped in tattered, ancient robes, emanating an aura of dark magic. It possesses a glowing, malevolent gaze and wields necromantic powers.
memorable: It can return to life unless its sacred vessel is destroyed, making it a persistent threat.
goals: To manipulate the living and exert control over undead minions.
relations: Often commands lesser undead and is sought by those desiring dark knowledge.
environment: Typically found in ancient ruins, crypts, or dark temples, often where dark rituals are performed.
strengths: Resistance to cold, lightning, and necrotic damage; can evade being turned.
weaknesses: Average physical abilities make it less effective in direct melee combat.
attacks: Uses Unholy Smite to inflict physical and necrotic damage while potentially charming the target.
most_powerful_ability: Rejuvenation allows it to return to life after being destroyed.
senses: Has truesight out to 60 feet and a passive Perception of 19, allowing it to detect unseen threats.
skills: Highly proficient in Insight and Perception, making it adept at sensing danger and understanding others.
additional_information: Possesses Legendary Resistance, allowing it to succeed on failed saving throws.
Can levitate, making it difficult to target.
Has a wide array of powerful spells at its disposal.
Can instill fear in adversaries with its Damnation ability.
Charms opponents, forcing them to become allies temporarily.
spellcasting: A 9th-level spellcaster using Wisdom with a spell save DC of 17, capable of casting control and offense spells.
test_queries: strong lich that manipulates the living
creature with truesight and necromantic powers
lich that can charm and levitate
powerful undead with wide spell selection
